attributes.action: allow Squires Cafe bar of Newthorpe Leeds to tarmac the gravel road for safety pruroses
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to allow Squires Cafe bar, Newthorpe Lane, Newthorpe, Leeds LS26 5LX to have the right to tarmac the gravel road on the premises for health and safety reasons and for prevention of cosmetic damage to vehicles.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Leeds City Council.
